open.title: Vumatel outage | Vorna Valley
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Vorna Valley, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Affected sites include:

The Homestead, Lombardy Road, Broadacres

Kengies Gate, Frederick Road, Broadacres

Aranmore Estate, Syringa Avenue, Broadacres
